participant_2.background:
I love my pets because they are always there to greet me when I come home from work.
i work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
I write about my travels and experiences.
everyday after work i buy my dog a dog biscuit.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going well so far! Just finished up some work. How about you?
Pretty good! Just got home from work. I'm a legal assistant in a law firm.
That's cool! I'm a writer and I like to travel.
That's awesome! I love to travel too! I've been to a few different countries.
Oh nice! I've only been to a few countries as well. I really want to go to Europe someday.
Europe is definitely on my list of places to travel to! It looks so beautiful.
It is! I've seen a lot of pictures and it looks like a dream.
It looks like it would be so much fun to explore.
I'm sure it would be! I think I'd like to start by visiting Italy.
Italy would be a great place to start! I've heard it's beautiful.
It looks like it is! I'm sure I'd love it there.
I'm sure you would too! It's definitely on my list of places to visit.
We should go together sometime! It would be so much fun to explore a new country with someone who's also into travel.
That would be awesome! I'd love to go to Italy with you.
Great! We should start planning our trip.
Sounds good to me! I'm excited to start planning.
Me too! This is going to be so much fun
